workflow.name: Create a Telegram bot with Mistral Nemotron AI and conversation memory
workflow.description:
# ü§ñ Create a Telegram Bot with Mistral AI and Conversation Memory

A sophisticated Telegram bot that provides AI-powered responses with conversation memory. This template demonstrates how to integrate any AI API service with Telegram, making it easy to swap between different AI providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, Google AI, or any other API-based AI model.

## üîß How it works

The workflow creates an intelligent Telegram bot that:
- üí¨ Maintains conversation history for each user
- üß† Provides contextual AI responses using **any AI API service**
- üì± Handles different message types and commands
- üîÑ Manages chat sessions with clear functionality
- üîå **Easily adaptable to any AI provider** (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google AI, etc.)

## ‚öôÔ∏è Set up steps

### üìã Prerequisites
- ü§ñ Telegram Bot Token (from @BotFather)
- üîë AI API Key (from any AI service provider)
- üöÄ n8n instance with webhook capability

### üõ†Ô∏è Configuration Steps

1. **ü§ñ Create Telegram Bot**
   - Message @BotFather on Telegram
   - Create new bot with `/newbot` command
   - Save the bot token for credentials setup

2. **üß† Choose Your AI Provider**
   - **OpenAI**: Get API key from OpenAI platform
   - **Anthropic**: Sign up for Claude API access
   - **Google AI**: Get Gemini API key
   - **NVIDIA**: Access LLaMA models
   - **Hugging Face**: Use inference API
   - **Any other AI API service**

3. **üîê Set up Credentials in n8n**
   - Add Telegram API credentials with your bot token
   - Add Bearer Auth/API Key credentials for your chosen AI service
   - Test both connections

4. **üöÄ Deploy Workflow**
   - Import the workflow JSON
   - **Customize the AI API call** (see customization section)
   - Activate the workflow
   - Set webhook URL in Telegram bot settings

## ‚ú® Features

### üöÄ Core Functionality
- **üì® Smart Message Routing**: Automatically categorizes incoming messages (commands, text, non-text)
- **üß† Conversation Memory**: Maintains chat history for each user (last 10 messages)
- **ü§ñ AI-Powered Responses**: Integrates with any AI API service for intelligent replies
- **‚ö° Command Support**: Built-in `/start` and `/clear` commands

### üì± Message Types Handled
- **üí¨ Text Messages**: Processed through AI model with context
- **üîß Commands**: Special handling for bot commands
- **‚ùå Non-text Messages**: Polite error message for unsupported content

### üíæ Memory Management
- üë§ User-specific chat history storage
- üîÑ Automatic history trimming (keeps last 10 messages)
- üåê Global state management across workflow executions

## ü§ñ Bot Commands

- `/start` üéØ - Welcome message with bot introduction
- `/clear` üóëÔ∏è - Clears conversation history for fresh start
- Regular text üí¨ - Processed by AI with conversation context

## üîß Technical Details

### üèóÔ∏è Workflow Structure
1. **üì° Telegram Trigger** - Receives all incoming messages
2. **üîÄ Message Filtering** - Routes messages based on type/content
3. **üíæ History Management** - Maintains conversation context
4. **üß† AI Processing** - Generates intelligent responses
5. **üì§ Response Delivery** - Sends formatted replies back to user

### ü§ñ AI API Integration (Customizable)
**Current Example (NVIDIA):**
- Model: `mistralai/mistral-nemotron`
- Temperature: 0.6 (balanced creativity)
- Max tokens: 4096
- Response limit: Under 200 words

**üîÑ Easy to Replace with Any AI Service:**

**OpenAI Example:**
```json
{
  "model": "gpt-4",
  "messages": [...],
  "temperature": 0.7,
  "max_tokens": 1000
}
```

**Anthropic Claude Example:**
```json
{
  "model": "claude-3-sonnet-20240229",
  "messages": [...],
  "max_tokens": 1000
}
```

**Google Gemini Example:**
```json
{
  "contents": [...],
  "generationConfig": {
    "temperature": 0.7,
    "maxOutputTokens": 1000
  }
}
```

### üõ°Ô∏è Error Handling
- ‚ùå Non-text message detection and appropriate responses
- üîß API failure handling
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid command processing

## üé® Customization Options

### ü§ñ AI Provider Switching
**To use a different AI service, modify the "NVIDIA LLaMA Chat Model" node:**

1. **üìù Change the URL** in HTTP Request node
2. **üîß Update the request body** format in "Prepare API Request" node
3. **üîê Update authentication** method if needed
4. **üìä Adjust response parsing** in "Save AI Response to History" node

### üß† AI Behavior
- üìù Modify system prompt in "Prepare API Request" node
- üå°Ô∏è Adjust temperature and response parameters
- üìè Change response length limits
- üéØ Customize model-specific parameters

### üíæ Memory Settings
- üìä Adjust history length (currently 10 messages)
- üë§ Modify user identification logic
- üóÑÔ∏è Customize data persistence approach

### üé≠ Bot Personality
- üéâ Update welcome message content
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Customize error messages and responses
- ‚ûï Add new command handlers

## üí° Use Cases

- **üéß Customer Support**: Automated first-line support with context awareness
- **üìö Educational Assistant**: Homework help and learning support
- **üë• Personal AI Companion**: General conversation and assistance
- **üíº Business Assistant**: FAQ handling and information retrieval
- **üî¨ AI API Testing**: Perfect template for testing different AI services
- **üöÄ Prototype Development**: Quick AI chatbot prototyping

## üìù Notes

- üåê Requires active n8n instance for webhook handling
- üí∞ AI API usage may have rate limits and costs (varies by provider)
- üíæ Bot memory persists across workflow restarts
- üë• Supports multiple concurrent users with separate histories
- üîÑ **Template is provider-agnostic** - easily switch between AI services
- üõ†Ô∏è **Perfect starting point** for any AI-powered Telegram bot project

## üîß Popular AI Services You Can Use

| Provider | Model Examples | API Endpoint Style |
|----------|---------------|-------------------|
| üü¢ **OpenAI** | GPT-4, GPT-3.5 | `https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions` |
| üîµ **Anthropic** | Claude 3 Opus, Sonnet | `https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages` |
| üî¥ **Google** | Gemini Pro, Gemini Flash | `https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com/v1beta/models/` |
| üü° **NVIDIA** | LLaMA, Mistral | `https://integrate.api.nvidia.com/v1/chat/completions` |
| üü† **Hugging Face** | Various OSS models | `https://api-inference.huggingface.co/models/` |
| üü£ **Cohere** | Command, Generate | `https://api.cohere.ai/v1/generate` |

*Simply replace the HTTP Request node configuration to switch providers!*

parameters.content:
# ü§ñ AI Telegram Bot Workflow

**Overview:**
This workflow creates an intelligent Telegram bot that:
- Remembers conversation history
- Responds to commands (/start, /clear)
- Uses NVIDIA's mistralai/mistral-nemotron model for AI responses
- Handles different message types appropriately

**Required Credentials:**
- Telegram Bot API token
- NVIDIA API Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE

## üîÄ Message Routing Logic

**Step 1:** All incoming messages are processed through multiple IF nodes to determine the appropriate response:

1. **Start Command** ‚Üí Welcome message
2. **Clear Command** ‚Üí Clear chat history
3. **Regular Text** ‚Üí AI processing
4. **Non-text Messages** ‚Üí Error message

This ensures each message type gets handled correctly.

parameters.text:
ü§ñ *Welcome to AI Assistant Bot!* ü§ñ

I'm here to help answer your questions with memory of our conversation. Just send me any text message!

*Features:*
‚Ä¢ Remember our conversation
‚Ä¢ Contextual responses
‚Ä¢ Answer follow-up questions
‚Ä¢ Quick and intelligent responses
‚Ä¢ Use `/clear` to restart the chat

Just type your question and I'll get back to you! üöÄ

parameters.content:
## üóÇÔ∏è Chat History Management

**Key Features:**
- Stores conversation per user ID
- Limits to last 10 messages (5 exchanges)
- Prevents token limit issues
- Maintains context across messages

**Clear Function:**
Completely removes user's chat history from memory for fresh start.

parameters.text: üóëÔ∏è Chat history cleared! Starting fresh conversation.

parameters.content:
## üß† AI Processing Pipeline

**Step 2:** Regular messages go through AI processing:

1. **Prepare Request** ‚Üí Format for NVIDIA API
2. **API Call** ‚Üí Send to mistralai/mistral-nemotron model
3. **Save Response** ‚Üí Add to chat history
4. **Send Reply** ‚Üí Return to user

**Model:** mistralai/mistral-nemotron
**Features:** Context-aware, limited to 200 words

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Error Handling

**Non-text Messages:**
Images, videos, documents, etc. are not supported and receive a friendly error message directing users to send text only.

**Future Enhancement:**
Could be extended to handle document processing or image analysis.

parameters.text: Sorry, I can only respond to text messages right now. Please send me a text message!

parameters.content:
## üîß Setup Instructions

**Required Credentials:**
1. **Telegram Bot Token:**
   - Create bot with @BotFather
   - Get API token
   - Add to Telegram credentials

2. **NVIDIA API Key:**
   - Register at NVIDIA developer portal
   - Generate API key
   - Add as Bearer YOUR_TOKEN_HERE credential

**Testing:**
- Send `/start` to test welcome message
- Send `/clear` to test history clearing
- Send regular messages to test AI responses

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
